statements.select:
SELECT COUNT(EMP_NO) FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY (CASE WHEN EMP_NO = #sesLoginEmpNo# THEN 1 ElSE 2 END), OCRS_CD, PSTN_CD, JICP_DT, EMP_NO) PSEQ , A.HSP_CD, C.COMN_NM AS HSP_NM, A.EMP_NO, STD_DT, EMP_NM, PTO_NM, SIGN_NM, BRDY_DT, BRDY_DVS, SSNO , EMAIL, ZIP_CD, ADDR, JICP_DT, LVCP_DT, A.DEPT_CD, NVL(B.DEPT_NM,'-') AS DEPT_NM, REAL_HSP_CD , OCGR_CD, NVL(H.COMN_NM,'-') AS OCGR_NM, OCTY_CD, NVL(D.COMN_NM,'-') AS OCTY_NM , PSTN_CD, NVL(E.COMN_NM,'-') AS PSTN_NM, OCRS_CD, NVL(F.COMN_NM,'-') AS OCRS_NM, WRK_STAT_CD , EXTS_NO, TEL_NO, CLPH_NO, REAL_DEPT_CD, I.DEPT_NM AS REAL_DEPT_NM FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY A.HSP_CD, A.EMP_NO ORDER BY STD_DT DESC) STD_SEQ , A.HSP_CD , EMP_NO, STD_DT, EMP_NM, PTO_NM, SIGN_NM , SUBSTR(DECODE(BRDY_DT,NULL,'19001231',BRDY_DT),5,2) ||'월 '|| SUBSTR(DECODE(BRDY_DT,NULL,'19001231',BRDY_DT),7,2) ||'일' AS BRDY_DT , BRDY_DVS, SSNO, NVL(EMAIL, '-') AS EMAIL, ZIP_CD, ADDR , NVL(JICP_DT,'-') AS JICP_DT, NVL(LVCP_DT,'-') AS LVCP_DT, A.DEPT_CD , REAL_HSP_CD , OCGR_CD , OCTY_CD , PSTN_CD , OCRS_CD , WRK_STAT_CD, NVL(EXTS_NO,'-') AS EXTS_NO, NVL(TEL_NO, '-') AS TEL_NO, CLPH_NO, REAL_DEPT_CD FROM CM_EMP_MST A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY OCRS_CD, PSTN_CD, JICP_DT ) A , V_DEPT_MST B , CM_COMN_CD C , CM_COMN_CD D , CM_COMN_CD E , CM_COMN_CD F , CM_COMN_CD H , V_DEPT_MST I WHERE A.STD_SEQ = 1 AND A.HSP_CD = B.HSP_CD (+) AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD (+) AND A.HSP_CD = C.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = D.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = E.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = F.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = H.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = I.HSP_CD(+) AND A.REAL_DEPT_CD = I.DEPT_CD(+) AND C.DVS_CD(+) ='MC001' AND D.DVS_CD(+) ='MI002' AND E.DVS_CD(+) ='MI003' AND F.DVS_CD(+) ='MI004' AND H.DVS_CD(+) ='MI001' AND A.HSP_CD = C.COMN_CD(+) AND A.OCTY_CD = D.COMN_CD(+) AND A.PSTN_CD = E.COMN_CD(+) AND A.OCRS_CD = F.COMN_CD(+) AND A.OCGR_CD = H.COMN_CD(+)
AND A.HSP_CD = #pSrchHspCd#
AND A.REAL_DEPT_CD = #pDeptCd#
AND A.PSTN_CD = #pPstnCd#
AND A.WRK_STAT_CD = #pWrkStatCd#
AND A.EMP_NM LIKE '%' || #pEmpNm# || '%'
) B

SELECT HSP_CD, HSP_NM, EMP_NO, STD_DT, EMP_NM, PTO_NM, SIGN_NM, BRDY_DT, BRDY_DVS, SSNO , EMAIL, ZIP_CD, ADDR, JICP_DT, LVCP_DT, DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, REAL_HSP_CD , OCGR_CD, OCGR_NM, OCTY_CD, OCTY_NM, PSTN_NM, OCRS_NM, PSTN_CD, OCRS_CD, WRK_STAT_CD , EXTS_NO, TEL_NO, CLPH_NO, REAL_DEPT_CD, REAL_DEPT_NM , CASE WHEN DEPT_CD = ( SELECT DEPT_CD FROM V_EMP_MST WHERE HSP_CD = #sesHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #sesLoginEmpNo# ) AND #sesLoginGrpCls# = 'S' THEN 'Y' WHEN EMP_NO = #sesLoginEmpNo# THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS VIEW_CHK FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY (CASE WHEN EMP_NO = #sesLoginEmpNo# THEN 1 ElSE 2 END), OCRS_CD, PSTN_CD, JICP_DT, EMP_NO) PSEQ , A.HSP_CD, C.COMN_NM AS HSP_NM, A.EMP_NO, STD_DT, EMP_NM, PTO_NM, SIGN_NM, BRDY_DT, BRDY_DVS, SSNO , EMAIL, ZIP_CD, ADDR, JICP_DT, LVCP_DT, A.DEPT_CD, NVL(B.DEPT_NM,'-') AS DEPT_NM, REAL_HSP_CD , OCGR_CD, NVL(H.COMN_NM,'-') AS OCGR_NM, OCTY_CD, NVL(D.COMN_NM,'-') AS OCTY_NM , PSTN_CD, NVL(E.COMN_NM,'-') AS PSTN_NM, OCRS_CD, NVL(F.COMN_NM,'-') AS OCRS_NM, WRK_STAT_CD , EXTS_NO, TEL_NO, CLPH_NO, REAL_DEPT_CD, I.DEPT_NM AS REAL_DEPT_NM FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY A.HSP_CD, A.EMP_NO ORDER BY STD_DT DESC) STD_SEQ , A.HSP_CD , EMP_NO, STD_DT, EMP_NM, PTO_NM, SIGN_NM , SUBSTR(DECODE(BRDY_DT,NULL,'19001231',BRDY_DT),5,2) ||'월 '|| SUBSTR(DECODE(BRDY_DT,NULL,'19001231',BRDY_DT),7,2) ||'일' AS BRDY_DT , BRDY_DVS, SSNO, NVL(EMAIL, '-') AS EMAIL, ZIP_CD, ADDR , NVL(JICP_DT,'-') AS JICP_DT, NVL(LVCP_DT,'-') AS LVCP_DT, A.DEPT_CD , REAL_HSP_CD , OCGR_CD , OCTY_CD , PSTN_CD , OCRS_CD , WRK_STAT_CD, NVL(EXTS_NO,'-') AS EXTS_NO, NVL(TEL_NO, '-') AS TEL_NO, CLPH_NO, REAL_DEPT_CD FROM CM_EMP_MST A WHERE A.STD_DT = (SELECT MAX(STD_DT) FROM CM_EMP_MST B WHERE B.HSP_CD = A.HSP_CD AND B.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO) ORDER BY OCRS_CD, PSTN_CD, JICP_DT ) A , V_DEPT_MST B , CM_COMN_CD C , CM_COMN_CD D , CM_COMN_CD E , CM_COMN_CD F , CM_COMN_CD H , V_DEPT_MST I WHERE A.STD_SEQ = 1 AND A.HSP_CD = B.HSP_CD (+) AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD (+) AND A.HSP_CD = C.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = D.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = E.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = F.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = H.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = I.HSP_CD(+) AND A.REAL_DEPT_CD = I.DEPT_CD(+) AND C.DVS_CD(+) ='MC001' AND D.DVS_CD(+) ='MI002' AND E.DVS_CD(+) ='MI003' AND F.DVS_CD(+) ='MI004' AND H.DVS_CD(+) ='MI001' AND A.HSP_CD = C.COMN_CD(+) AND A.OCTY_CD = D.COMN_CD(+) AND A.PSTN_CD = E.COMN_CD(+) AND A.OCRS_CD = F.COMN_CD(+) AND A.OCGR_CD = H.COMN_CD(+)
AND A.HSP_CD = #pSrchHspCd#
AND A.REAL_DEPT_CD = #pDeptCd#
AND A.PSTN_CD = #pPstnCd#
AND A.WRK_STAT_CD = #pWrkStatCd#
AND A.EMP_NM LIKE '%' || #pEmpNm# || '%'
) B WHERE B.PSEQ BETWEEN (#page_sz#*(#page#-1) + 1) AND (#page_sz#*#page#)

SELECT A.HSP_CD, EMP_NO, STD_DT, EMP_NM, PTO_NM, SIGN_NM , DECODE(BRDY_DT,NULL,'19001231', BRDY_DT) AS BRDY_DT , BRDY_DVS, SSNO, EMAIL, ZIP_CD, ADDR, JICP_DT, LVCP_DT, A.DEPT_CD, B.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM , REAL_HSP_CD , OCGR_CD , OCTY_CD , C.COMN_NM AS OCTY_NM , PSTN_CD , D.COMN_NM AS PSTN_NM , OCRS_CD , E.COMN_NM AS OCRS_NM , WRK_STAT_CD, EXTS_NO, TEL_NO, CLPH_NO , REAL_DEPT_CD, F.DEPT_NM REAL_DEPT_NM FROM CM_EMP_MST A , V_DEPT_MST B , CM_COMN_CD C , CM_COMN_CD D , CM_COMN_CD E , V_DEPT_MST F WHERE A.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND A.EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND A.STD_DT = #pStdDt# AND A.HSP_CD = B.HSP_CD (+) AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD (+) AND A.HSP_CD = C.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = D.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = E.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = F.HSP_CD(+) AND A.REAL_DEPT_CD = F.DEPT_CD(+) AND C.DVS_CD(+) ='MI002' AND D.DVS_CD(+) ='MI003' AND E.DVS_CD(+) ='MI004' AND A.OCTY_CD = C.COMN_CD(+) AND A.PSTN_CD = D.COMN_CD(+) AND A.OCRS_CD = E.COMN_CD(+)
SELECT EMP_NO , EMP_NM FROM CM_EMP_MST WHERE HSP_CD = #sesHspCd# ORDER BY EMP_NO

SELECT V.VCT_CNT , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS , V.VCT_CNT - NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS, 0) AS VCT_NUSE_DYS , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS_00, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS_00 , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS_10, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS_10 , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS_20, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS_20 , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS_90, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS_90 , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS_30, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS_30 , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS_40, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS_40 , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS_50, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS_50 , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS_60, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS_60 , NVL(A.VCT_USE_DYS_70, 0) AS VCT_USE_DYS_70 FROM (SELECT HSP_CD , EMP_NO , EMP_NM , JICP_DT , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(JICP_DT,1,4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') THEN CASE WHEN SUBSTR(JICP_DT,5,2) = '01' AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(JICP_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),6) < TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 3 WHEN SUBSTR(JICP_DT,5,2) = '02' AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(JICP_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),6) < TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 2.5 WHEN SUBSTR(JICP_DT,5,2) = '03' AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(JICP_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),6) < TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 2 WHEN SUBSTR(JICP_DT,5,2) = '04' AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(JICP_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),6) < TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1.5 WHEN SUBSTR(JICP_DT,5,2) = '05' AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(JICP_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),6) < TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1 WHEN SUBSTR(JICP_DT,5,2) = '06' AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(JICP_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),6) < TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 0.5 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(JICP_DT,1,4)) < 10 THEN 6+TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(JICP_DT,1,4)) ELSE 15 END END AS VCT_CNT FROM V_EMP_MST WHERE EMP_NO NOT IN ('ADMIN','1000001') ) V , (SELECT A.HSP_CD, A.APV_EMP_NO , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS IN ('00', '10', '20', '90') THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS = '00' THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS_00 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS = '10' THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS_10 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS = '20' THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS_20 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS = '90' THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS_90 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS = '30' THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS_30 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS = '40' THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS_40 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS = '50' THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS_50 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS = '60' THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS_60 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VCT_CLS = '70' THEN A.VCT_USE_DYS ELSE 0 END) AS VCT_USE_DYS_70 FROM ( SELECT A.HSP_CD, A.KEY_NO, A.APV_EMP_NO, C.COMN_CLS AS VCT_CLS , SUM(CASE WHEN A.STRT_DT = A.END_DT AND C.MEMO = '0.5' THEN 0.5 ELSE D.WRK_DYS_OTPT END) AS VCT_USE_DYS FROM GA_APV A , CM_COMN_CD C , DD_PRD_DD D WHERE A.HSP_CD = #sesHspCd# AND A.DOC_TYP = 'VC' AND A.STAT_CD = 'C' AND C.DVS_CD = 'UT040' AND A.HSP_CD = C.HSP_CD AND A.VCT_DVS = C.COMN_CD AND A.HSP_CD = D.HSP_CD AND D.PRD_YMD BETWEEN A.STRT_DT AND A.END_DT AND A.STRT_DT >= SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4)||'0101' AND A.STRT_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY A.HSP_CD, A.KEY_NO, A.APV_EMP_NO, C.COMN_CLS ) A GROUP BY A.HSP_CD, A.APV_EMP_NO ) A WHERE V.HSP_CD = #sesHspCd# AND V.EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND V.HSP_CD = A.HSP_CD(+) AND V.EMP_NO = A.APV_EMP_NO(+)

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.STD_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') STD_DT_NM , STD_DT , A.HSP_CD , NVL(C.COMN_NM, '-') AS HSP_NM , EMP_NO, EMP_NM, JICP_DT, LVCP_DT, A.DEPT_CD, NVL(B.DEPT_NM, '-') AS DEPT_NM , OCGR_CD , NVL(H.COMN_NM,'-') AS OCGR_NM , OCTY_CD , NVL(D.COMN_NM, '-') AS OCTY_NM , PSTN_CD , NVL(E.COMN_NM, '-') AS PSTN_NM , OCRS_CD , NVL(F.COMN_NM, '-') AS OCRS_NM , WRK_STAT_CD , NVL(G.COMN_NM, '-') AS WRK_STAT_NM FROM CM_EMP_MST A , V_DEPT_MST B , CM_COMN_CD C , CM_COMN_CD D , CM_COMN_CD E , CM_COMN_CD F , CM_COMN_CD G , CM_COMN_CD H WHERE A.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND A.EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND A.HSP_CD = B.HSP_CD (+) AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD (+) AND A.HSP_CD = C.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = D.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = E.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = F.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = G.HSP_CD(+) AND A.HSP_CD = H.HSP_CD(+) AND C.DVS_CD(+) ='MC001' AND D.DVS_CD(+) ='MI002' AND E.DVS_CD(+) ='MI003' AND F.DVS_CD(+) ='MI004' AND G.DVS_CD(+) ='MI005' AND H.DVS_Cd(+) ='MI001' AND A.OCTY_CD = D.COMN_CD(+) AND A.PSTN_CD = E.COMN_CD(+) AND A.OCRS_CD = F.COMN_CD(+) AND A.WRK_STAT_CD = G.COMN_CD(+) AND A.OCGR_CD = H.COMN_CD(+) ORDER BY A.STD_DT DESC
statements.update: INSERT INTO CM_EMP_MST ( HSP_CD , EMP_NO , STD_DT , EMP_NM , PTO_NM , BRDY_DT , BRDY_DVS , SSNO , PW , EMAIL , ZIP_CD , ADDR , JICP_DT , LVCP_DT , DEPT_CD , REAL_HSP_CD , REAL_DEPT_CD , OCGR_CD , PSTN_CD , OCRS_CD , WRK_STAT_CD , EXTS_NO , TEL_NO , CLPH_NO , INPT_EMP_NO , INPT_IP , INPT_DTM ) VALUES (#cboHspCd# , #pEmpNo# , #pStdDt# , #txtEmpNm# , #pPtoNm# , #pBrdy# , #rdoBrdyDvs# , #txtssno# , DEFAULT , #txtEmail# , #txtZipCd# , #txtAddr# , #InPrdYmd# , #OutPrdYmd# , #hdnDeptCd# , #cboHspCd# , #hdnRealDeptCd# , #cboOcgrCd# , #cboPstnCd# , #cboOcrsCd# , #cboWrkSt# , #txtExtsNo# , #txtTelNo# , #txtCPhn# , #sesLoginEmpNo# , #userIP# , SYSDATE )

UPDATE CM_EMP_MST SET EMP_NM = #txtEmpNm#
, PTO_NM = #pPtoNm#
, BRDY_DT = #pBrdy# , BRDY_DVS = #rdoBrdyDvs# , SSNO = #txtssno# , EMAIL = #txtEmail# , ZIP_CD = #txtZipCd# , ADDR = #txtAddr# , JICP_DT = #InPrdYmd# , LVCP_DT = #OutPrdYmd# , DEPT_CD = #hdnDeptCd# , REAL_DEPT_CD = #hdnRealDeptCd# , OCGR_CD = #cboOcgrCd# , PSTN_CD = #cboPstnCd# , OCRS_CD = #cboOcrsCd# , WRK_STAT_CD = #cboWrkSt# , EXTS_NO = #txtExtsNo# , TEL_NO = #txtTelNo# , CLPH_NO = #txtCPhn# , MDF_EMP_NO = #sesLoginEmpNo# , MDF_IP = #userIP# , MDF_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND STD_DT = #pStdDt#
DELETE FROM CM_EMP_MST WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND STD_DT = #pStdDt#
statements.select: SELECT A.IND_CD , B.IND_NM , NVL(SUM(A.TMM_RSLT),0) AS RSLT FROM PM_IND_RSLT_MM A , CM_IND_MST B , CM_EMP_EVLT_IND C WHERE A.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND A.HSP_CD = B.HSP_CD AND A.IND_CD = B.IND_CD AND A.HSP_CD = C.HSP_CD AND A.IND_CD = C.IND_CD AND C.REAL_DEPT_CD = #pRealDeptCd# AND ( (C.COMN_YN = 'N' AND A.EMP_NO = #pEmpNo#) OR (C.COMN_YN = 'Y' )) AND A.PRD_YM = (SELECT MAX(PRD_YM) FROM PM_IND_RSLT_MM WHERE HSP_CD = #pHspCd#) GROUP BY A.IND_CD , B.IND_NM

SELECT A.* FROM (
SELECT E.EDU_SEQ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.EDU_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') EDU_DT , E.EDU_CD , C.COMN_NM EDU_NM , E.EDU_SCR , E.INCG_EMP_NO , EE.EMP_NM INCG_EMP_NM , E.PASS_YN , E.MEMO , E.EDU_ORG_NM
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY EDU_SEQ DESC) SEQ_DVS
FROM CM_EMP_EDU_HST E , CM_COMN_CD C , V_EMP_MST EE WHERE E.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND E.EMP_NO = #pEmpNo#
AND E.EDU_SEQ = #pSeqNo#
AND C.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND C.DVS_CD = 'UT526' AND E.EDU_CD = C.COMN_CD AND EE.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND E.INCG_EMP_NO = EE.EMP_NO
) A WHERE SEQ_DVS <= 3

SELECT A.* FROM (
SELECT EVLT_SEQ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(EVLT_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') EVLT_DT , RNK , TOT_CNT , PSTN_RNK , PSTN_CNT , TOT_SCR , PSTN_AVG_SCR , EVLT_SCR1 , EVLT_SCR2 , EVLT_SCR3 , EVLT_SCR4 , EVLT_SCR5 , EVLT_SCR6 , EVLT_SCR7
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY EVLT_SEQ DESC) SEQ_DVS
FROM CM_EMP_EVLT_HST WHERE HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo#
AND EVLT_SEQ = #pSeqNo#
) A WHERE SEQ_DVS <= 2

SELECT C.CNSL_SEQ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.CNSL_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') CNSL_DT , C.CNSL_EMP_NO , E.EMP_NM CNSL_EMP_NM , C.CNSL_RSN , CC.COMN_NM CNSL_RSN_NM , C.CNSL_CNTE FROM CM_EMP_CNSL_HST C , V_EMP_MST E , CM_COMN_CD CC WHERE C.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND C.EMP_NO = #pEmpNo#
AND C.CNSL_SEQ = #pSeqNo#
AND E.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND C.CNSL_EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO AND CC.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND CC.DVS_CD = 'UT527' AND C.CNSL_RSN = CC.COMN_CD ORDER BY C.CNSL_SEQ DESC

SELECT P.PRS_SEQ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(P.PRS_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') PRS_DT , P.PRS_EMP_NO , E.EMP_NM AS PRS_EMP_NM , P.PRS_CNTE FROM CM_EMP_PRS_HST P , V_EMP_MST E WHERE P.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND P.EMP_NO = #pEmpNo#
AND P.PRS_SEQ = #pSeqNo#
AND E.HSP_CD = #pHspCd# AND P.PRS_EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO ORDER BY P.PRS_SEQ DESC
SELECT NVL(MAX(DISTINCT EDU_SEQ),0) + 1 FROM CM_EMP_EDU_HST WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo#
statements.update: INSERT INTO CM_EMP_EDU_HST ( HSP_CD , EMP_NO , EDU_DVS , EDU_SEQ , EDU_DT , EDU_CD , INCG_EMP_NO , EDU_ORG_NM , EDU_SCR , PASS_YN , MEMO , INPT_EMP_NO , INPT_IP , INPT_DTM ) VALUES ( #cboHspCd# , #pEmpNo# , 'T' , #txtExamSeq# , #txtExamDt# , #cboExamCd# , #hdnIncgEmpNo# , #txtExamOrgNm# , #txtExamScr# , #rdoPassYN# , #txaMemo# , #sesLoginEmpNo# , #userIP# , SYSDATE )

UPDATE CM_EMP_EDU_HST SET EDU_DT = #txtExamDt# , EDU_CD = #cboExamCd# , INCG_EMP_NO = #hdnIncgEmpNo# , EDU_ORG_NM = #txtExamOrgNm# , EDU_SCR = #txtExamScr# , PASS_YN = #rdoPassYN# , MEMO = #txaMemo# , MDF_EMP_NO = #sesLoginEmpNo# , MDF_IP = #userIP# , MDF_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND EDU_SEQ = #txtExamSeq#
DELETE CM_EMP_EDU_HST WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND EDU_SEQ = #txtExamSeq#
statements.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(DISTINCT CNSL_SEQ),0) + 1 FROM CM_EMP_CNSL_HST WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo#
statements.update: INSERT INTO CM_EMP_CNSL_HST ( HSP_CD , EMP_NO , CNSL_SEQ , CNSL_DT , CNSL_EMP_NO , CNSL_RSN , CNSL_CNTE , INPT_EMP_NO , INPT_IP , INPT_DTM ) VALUES ( #cboHspCd# , #pEmpNo# , #txtCnslSeq# , #txtCnslDt# , #hdnCnslEmpNo# , #cboCnslRsn# , #txaCnslCnte# , #sesLoginEmpNo# , #userIP# , SYSDATE )

UPDATE CM_EMP_CNSL_HST SET CNSL_DT = #txtCnslDt# , CNSL_EMP_NO = #hdnCnslEmpNo# , CNSL_RSN = #cboCnslRsn# , CNSL_CNTE = #txaCnslCnte# , MDF_EMP_NO = #sesLoginEmpNo# , MDF_IP = #userIP# , MDF_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND CNSL_SEQ = #txtCnslSeq#
DELETE CM_EMP_CNSL_HST WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND CNSL_SEQ = #txtCnslSeq#
statements.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(DISTINCT PRS_SEQ),0) + 1 FROM CM_EMP_PRS_HST WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo#
statements.update: INSERT INTO CM_EMP_PRS_HST ( HSP_CD , EMP_NO , PRS_SEQ , PRS_DT , PRS_EMP_NO , PRS_CNTE , INPT_EMP_NO , INPT_IP , INPT_DTM ) VALUES ( #cboHspCd# , #pEmpNo# , #txtPrsSeq# , #txtPrsDt# , #hdnPrsEmpNo# , #txaPrsCnte# , #sesLoginEmpNo# , #userIP# , SYSDATE )

UPDATE CM_EMP_PRS_HST SET PRS_DT = #txtPrsDt# , PRS_EMP_NO = #hdnPrsEmpNo# , PRS_CNTE = #txaPrsCnte# , MDF_EMP_NO = #sesLoginEmpNo# , MDF_IP = #userIP# , MDF_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND PRS_SEQ = #txtPrsSeq#
DELETE CM_EMP_PRS_HST WHERE HSP_CD = #cboHspCd# AND EMP_NO = #pEmpNo# AND PRS_SEQ = #txtPrsSeq#
